divs: sighting detailsmy family and i were at lake mayfield close to mossyrock wa, watching fireworks when we saw 2 orange balls came from south west headed in an easterly direction , they got about 3\4 of the way across the sky and just disappeared into thin air. then a few minutes latter another one did the same thing . then a few minutes latter another , then another .we saw a total of six. they appeared to be moving at a very high rate of speed. weird and freaky , does anyone know what these were ? alan
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mossyrock
There were no other sightings in Mossyrock on or around July 4th 2012
Summary: Saw six orange balls fly across the sky in the spane of about 20 min or so, they all disapeared into thin air .
